attributes.action: Challenge Unemployed People with no major disability to Set Up A business and Work the hours Self Employed Workers Work For 6 months
attributes.additional_details:
Everyone is tongue lashing the government new benefit rules.
I don't like Mr Cameron, don't like the lib dems either.
BUT
I am British and have the right to work and receive social security remunerations if I am in need.
The culture of staying home and lounging is poor practice and sets up our children for a fall.
I work while my child sleeps to write and type articles for as little as £1 for a 500 word article.

I sometimes work from 10pm till 7am, stop to do the school run, do the housework , sleep at 11am and then wake at 2pm to fix the dinner and do the school run. play mum, do the bed time bath, read a story and go back to work 5 days a week.
I challenge everyone who thinks they have the right to receive any money for nothing to either do what several self employed folk and I do for 6 months or  give up their claim.
